Description: Reproduction mould-made pottery lamp of Hellenistic type, with a dolphin lug-handle on the left side. The wide shoulder is decorated with tongues and loops. On the nozzle-top is a club between volutes. The lamp stands on an oval base-ring.
Curator's comments: Purchased at a shop in Cairo; not sold as ancient to a discerning customer.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q3494)
